title: What Steelers WR emerges as No. 2 behind JuJu? AFC North Position Battles with BMac (Football 7/24)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and Bryant McFadden break down the latest news and notes from around the NFL, including Mark Sanchez' retirement (0:30) Jarran Reed's suspension (7:00) and Tyler Boyd's extension (13:45). Then the guys dive into the camp battles in the AFC North, looking at the Steelers WRs (16:25), Ravens pass rusher (20:25), Browns CBs (25:45) and Bengals LBs (29:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
